thread.title: Toyota Microsoft Chrysler among advertisers for Yahoo NFL game

title: Toyota Microsoft Chrysler among advertisers for Yahoo NFL game
text:
Toyota, Microsoft, Chrysler among advertisers for Yahoo NFL game 
Times of India Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Toyota Motor Corp, Microsoft Corp and Chrysler are among the brands that will advertise this weekend during Yahoo Inc's first live-streamed National Football League game, the internet company said Thursday...
